favourite.article: Praise the Lord! Reigning in life is being ruled by the spirit :)
Reign in life for we are in the kingdom of God. Minister Christ and be a part to close this current evil age and realize the Kingdom Life.

We are God's chosen people, whether we like it or not the Lord will restrict and limit us. Until today the Lord is working that every regenerated one will cooperate with Him to bring His kingdom and realize the kingdom life. HALELLUJAH...

Lord today, Lord, right now! Oh Lord what a privilege it is to be Yours, to be part of Your dispensing God into man, part of Your Body on this earth to hasten the preparing of Your warrior Bride to bring Your kingdom in manifestation, in reality!!!!!!!

The kingdom of the world has become the kingdom of our LORD & of His Christ, & He will reign forever & ever! Amen! We thank YOU, LORD God the Almighty, He who is & who was, because YOU have taken YOUR great power & have reigned. Rev.11:15b, 17. Saints, Look, there is a Man on the Throne ruling on earth today! LORD, Bring & Keep us fully under YOU, enjoying YOU, daily one with our Beloved God, Possess us a people under YOUR Showers of blessings one with the river of water of life. Thank YOU for O/our College-Age, YP, Bless now upcoming ITERO, John 17:1. Empower each one part to speak the New Jerusalem into being brighter &brighter, LORD, thank YOU for YOUR Manifestations in each locality on earth 2015 Come our Beloved Master our King we Do Pray for the closing of this age!
A very refreshing hymn. Thank You Lord for the heavenly vision! Reign in life. Be ruled by the Spirit, Be restricted and limited; Reign in life to bring in God’s kingdom!
What a wonderful hymn. Lord may we continue to seek more of You no matter our situation. May our time of confinement be a golden opportunity to turn to You. Amen.
